name: Introduction to Musicology
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of musicology, including music theory, music history, and music psychology.

name: Music Theory for Musicology
description: This course provides an introduction to music theory, including fundamentals of music notation, scales, intervals, chords, and composition.

name: Introduction to Music History
description: This course provides an introduction to the history of music, including historical developments, musical styles, and the influence of music on culture.

name: Music Psychology
description: This course provides an introduction to the psychology of music, including music perception, emotion, and meaning.
